overview: The Pumpkin Scented Candle is a Master Mode-exclusive light pet-summoning item dropped by Pumpking with a 1/8 (12.5%) to 1/4 (25%) chance. When used or equipped, it summons a miniature Pumpking named Jack 'O Lantern.
title: Pumpkin Scented Candle

grant.tooltip: A small Jack 'O Lantern is fiendishly lighting the way
